nodes.bodyText: Maybe add "and should only be used to create anonymous container and blob clients." Just in case people wonder "well then what's the point?" lol
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1,5 +1,8 @@
 # Release History
 
+## 12.3.0-beta.1 (Unreleased)
+- Added ability to create service clients anonymously. Anonymous service clients will throw on attempting to create network requests.

nodes.bodyText: I think somehow having the word anonymous in the method name will make it more self descriptive.
